attributes.action: Ensure that any inquiry which concludes that LIBOR manipulation by our bankers was a crime, is a Truth and Punishment Inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: Forgiveness of the bankers who have consistently demonstrated that their raison d'etre is self enrichment through fleecing the poor of the planet, is NOT an option.  Any banker who is found to have committed a criminal act should be tried and sentenced with extreme prejudice.
